channel.title: The Bloging site
channel.description: Recent content on The Bloging site

item.title: Greet the world in Python
item.description: Congratulations on making efforts of learning a new language. Python is relatively very easy to than the other programming languages. If you knwo English and logic, learning python will be a walk on a cake. Let’s get started with classic hello world program def greet(): print("Hello World")
item.content:
Congratulations on making efforts of learning a new language.

Python is relatively very easy to than the other programming languages. If you knwo English and logic, learning python will be a walk on a cake.

Let’s get started with classic hello world program

def greet():
    print("Hello World")

item.title: Secondposts
item.description: System design 102 This is in continuation with the my first blog [firstpost.md]. We will talk about load balancers vs reverse proxy. I will be talking continue posting about stuff like this is the future. If you like what I am doing, follow me on my website [{www.harshal.chaudhari.com}].
item.content:
System design 102

This is in continuation with the my first blog [firstpost.md]. We will talk about load balancers vs reverse proxy.

I will be talking continue posting about stuff like this is the future. If you like what I am doing, follow me on my website [{www.harshal.chaudhari.com}].

item.title: Firstpost
item.description: System design 101 This is very detailed blog about how to choose which programing language, framework, database to use for a project. I will be talking continue posting about stuff like this is the future. If you like what I am doing, follow me on my github.

item.title: About
item.description: Welcome to my HUGO project!!! I have created this using HUGO which is build using Golang. It is the fastest static file generator. I am creating this dummy project to learn HUGO. And to generate beautiful static html using theams provided by HUGO.
item.content:
Welcome to my HUGO project!!!

I have created this using HUGO which is build using Golang. It is the fastest static file generator.

I am creating this dummy project to learn HUGO. And to generate beautiful static html using theams provided by HUGO.
